lender.name: J I N W E N S I
Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help enrich the lives of others and see people succeed on their own terms. I am lucky to be in a position to help others due to my economic and social well-being compared to the rest of the world's people.

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: I loan becuase I want to help people in need.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that there is an organization I can contribute through and help other people with micro loans. As more people join, it will have a huge effect on third world poverty. I feel good when the little people are empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I sell men and women's clothing in a boutique.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to help other people, and it gives me pleasure to do so
lender.occupational_info: I manage a business that looks after people's savings for their old age

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: i want to help people who are less privilaged. the US has lost sight of helping others, i hope to change this.
lender.occupational_info: with limited time on my schedule as a student, this is a great way to reach out to others who need assistance. i am a swimmer and a water polo player

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I'm a enormous prick in real life, it's a way to earn some karma back.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for businesses to sell products or services

lender.name: Chele
lender.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world who want to help themselves all they need is a little support. Like I did when I was starting out. A small loan made it possible for me to excel in my business. I want to do the same for other people. I support organic and natural farming, sustainable ecological practices, and people whose job helps them support others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I apply Henna to the skin in artistic designs for transitional gatherings (marriages, births) or just for fun. I work mostly at the local farmer's market and private gatherings. Every morning at the farmer's market I Henna the young market kids for free. It makes it fun for all of us and it is my way of giving back to the people there. I believe that the Henna plant is sacred and magical, I honor it and always bless my homemade paste. Come to my website and see what I'm doing. :)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: The only way to support the developing world is to teach them how to use First World capitalism. This way approach, rather than "free aid" gives recipients an incentive to earn more than the loan and grow a prosperous business to the benefit to themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Gettysburg College.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs some help sometime.

lender.name: Pl Sundsy
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's a small step in the right direction :) Kiva is the world's first person-to-person micro-lending website, empowering individuals to lend directly to unique entrepreneurs around the globe. With Kiva, I can help people in poor countries to start their own small businesses. These people are not allowed to borrow money in regular banks because they are poor. Via Kiva, I can help them to reach their full potential. It feels good to help and it is very rewarding to observe how they succeed with their small projects.
lender.occupational_info: I have a background in Physics and Mathematics and works in a global telecom company with analysis of customer and traffic information

I learned the business administration sector is 2 years, I believe I have enough knowledge to trade
I found a place to get cheap clothes, design clothes (normal quality fabric). I carried on sale for students at where I live with affordable prices. Poor students should be supporting me! My shop will be called "shop students. I believe I will succeed! I need to borrow 1000 usd

lender.occupational_info: When I design a garden, I use native plants that will attract local wildlife, pollinators and beneficial insects. I use drought tolerant plants so they don't need a lot of water. I plant as much food as the customer will allow me to so that we can build a world where people are helping to spread organic food production so we can be healthy. I maintain the gardens so they can be as healthy as possible by using compost and keeping the plants immune systems healthy to prevent disease just like I take care of my body that way!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: What man is a man who does not make the world better?

lender.name: David

I'm a traveler, an immigrant and a world citizen and I want to see less inequalities across the world.

I'm also a photographer interested in social documentaries.
